T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    (a, b) = map(int, input().split())
    print(1 if a % b else 0)

goals = int(input())
for distractions in range(goals):
    (life, wife) = map(int, input().split())
    print(1 if life % wife else 0)

t = int(input())
for it in range(t):
    (l, k) = map(int, input().split())
    print(1) if l % k != 0 else print(0)
